hero.heading: 19-20 FEB 2020 - The Brewery, City of London
hero.title: PHP UK Conference
hero.additional_content: We are pleased to announce the 15th Annual PHP UK Conference. An optional workshop day followed by two days of amazing talks, plentiful networking opportunities and great socials. PHP UK offers the most up-to-date PHP information and training.

hero.heading: The Venue
hero.title: The Brewery
hero.additional_content: PHP UK Conference is back at The Brewery this year, right in the heart of the City of London. The Brewery occupies the site of the former Whitbread brewery in East London. Samuel Whitbread opened The Brewery in 1750. Brewing on the site continued until 1976.
